apply.standaloneHelp: Standalone mode: certbot will temporarily start a web server listening on port 80 to complete verification. Using this mode requires stopping your existing web server (e.g., Nginx, Apache) first, otherwise there will be a port conflict. Certbot will automatically exit after verification is complete.
